dialogue.htmlContent:
[style.boldBrown(Dominion Express)]
Looking at the business card given to you by Natalya, you see that the delivery company which employs her as a 'Stable Mistress' is very near to where you're currently standing, and is open to visiting members of the public between the hours of #IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) [style.colourMinorGood([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which this 'Dominion Express' operates is currently [style.colourGood(open)], you could head inside and see if you could arrange to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ELSE [style.colourMinorBad([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which this 'Dominion Express' operates is currently [style.colourBad(closed)], you'll have to come back during opening hours if you wanted to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ENDIF
